name: noir-starter
description: A template repository to get started with writing zero knowledge programs with Noir.

scripts.deploy:localhost: hardhat compile && hardhat run --network localhost scripts/deploy.ts
scripts.compile: cd circuits && nargo compile --package utxo_signature && nargo compile --package utxo_ownership && nargo compile --package utxo_inputs && nargo compile --package utxo_outputs && nargo compile --package low_nullifier && nargo compile --package aggregator && nargo codegen-verifier
